title: coTherapist
description: coTherapist is your AI-powered virtual assistant, designed to handle clinical documentation and session analysis, freeing you to provide more effective mental healthcare.

title: Mestrual-LLaMA
description: A specialized Large Language Model fine-tuned for providing accurate, culturally sensitive menstrual health education in India, breaking stigmas through accessible AI.

title: SPARTA: Speaker and Time-aware Joint Contextual Learning
description: An NLP project focusing on dialogue-act classification in counselling conversations using speaker and time-aware contextual learning, with code and dataset released alongside the WSDM 2022 paper.

title: READER: Response-Act Guided Reinforced Dialogue Generation
description: A response-act guided reinforced dialogue generation model for mental health counseling conversations, designed to improve Virtual Mental Health Assistantsâ€™ ability to generate contextually appropriate responses.
